Subroutine vom_daily_init

808 : 
809 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
810 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
811 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
812 : 
813 :       subroutine vom_daily_init ()
814 :       use vegwatmod
815 :       use vegmod
816 :       use watmod
817 :       implicit none
818 : 
819 :       rsurfvec(:) = rsurfnewvec(:)
820 :       rsurfg_(:)  = rsurfgnew(:)
821 :       lambda_     = lambdafac * (SUM(pcapnewvec(1:pos_)) / pos_) ** wsexp  ! (3.45) 
822 :       lambdag     = lambdagfac * pcapnewvec(1) ** wsgexp  ! (3.44)
823 : !     * vector with values varying by 1%
824 :       jmax25_(:)  = jmax25_(2) * (/0.99,1.0,1.01/)
825 : !     * making sure that the values don't become too low, otherwise
826 : !       they could never pick up again
827 :       jmax25_(:)  = MAX(jmax25_(:), 50.0d-6)
828 :       jmax25g(:)  = jmax25g(2) * (/0.99,1.0,1.01/)
829 :       jmax25g(:)  = MAX(jmax25g(:), 50.0d-6)
830 :       pcg_(:)     = pcg_(2) + (/-0.02,0.0,0.02/)  ! vector with values varying by 1%
831 :       pcg_(:)     = MAX(pcg_(:), 0.d0)
832 :       pcg_(3)     = MIN(MAX(pcgmin, pcg_(3)), 1.d0 - pc_)
833 : !     * (3.38) foliage turnover costs, assuming LAI/pc of 2.5
834 :       tcg(:)      = tcf * pcg_(:) * 2.5d0
835 : !     * (3.40), (Out[190])  root respiration [mol/s]
836 :       rr_         = 2.55d-7 * SUM(rsurfvec(1:pos_))
837 : 
838 :       if (pos_ .gt. nlayersnew) then
839 : !       * (3.42, 2.45e-10 from (Out[165])) costs of water distribution and storage
840 :         cpcc_ = cpccf * pc_ * rootdepth + mdstore * 2.45d-10
841 :       else
842 :         cpcc_ = cpccf * pc_ * SUM(delzvec(1:pos_)) + mdstore * 2.45d-10
843 :       endif
844 : 
845 :       if (nlayersnew .lt. posg) then
846 :         cpccg(:) = cpccf * pcg_(:) * rgdepth  ! (3.42) water transport costs
847 :       else
848 :         cpccg(:) = cpccf * pcg_(:) * SUM(delzvec(1:posg))
849 :       endif
850 : 
851 : !     * (3.40), (Out[190]) root respiration grasses [mol/s]
852 :       rrg = 2.55d-7 * SUM(rsurfg_(1:posg))
853 : !     * resetting the minimum steady-state tissue water content to
854 : !       its maximum value
855 :       mqssmin = mqx_
856 : 
857 : !     * used for daily recalculation
858 :       if (optmode .eq. 0) then
859 :         tmax(d___)    = -9999.d0
860 :         tmin(d___)    =  9999.d0
861 :         rainvec(d___) =     0.d0
862 :         parvec(d___)  =     0.d0
863 :         srad(d___)    =     0.d0
864 :       endif
865 : 
866 :       if (optmode .eq. 0) then
867 :         ruptk_d  = 0.d0
868 :         vd_d     = 0.d0
869 :         jmax_d   = 0.d0
870 :         jmaxg_d  = 0.d0
871 :         gstom_d  = 0.d0
872 :         gstomg_d = 0.d0
873 :         etm_d    = 0.d0
874 :         etmg_d   = 0.d0
875 :         esoil_d  = 0.d0
876 :         spgfcf_d = 0.d0
877 :         infx_d   = 0.d0
878 :         rl_d     = 0.d0
879 :         rlg_d    = 0.d0
880 :       endif
881 : 
882 :       return
883 :       end subroutine vom_daily_init
